Apni innocent si smile mat bhul jaana

text:
Jhaantu kya sahi naam h bhai. Matlab koi naam kisi insaan ko itne ache se kaise describe kr skta h. 
Tera engine ki tarah hasna aur bobble head ki tarah hilna is so apt for your child like body man ðŸ˜‚. Abhi bhi headbanging karta h kya brush krte hue? Thank me for adding you to the almighty 'share good songs group'. Wahi se tera music taste refine hua h I guess ðŸ˜Œ. 
Eng ke courses ke humsafar h apn to. Aakhri sem bs achla mc kide krdi. Nahi to koi research paper hi likh dete saath m. Ime m bhi carry kra h papa ne tujhe. You are welcome ðŸ˜‰. 
First sem se hi tu hi apna dedicated partner h sports m. Bas yahi bura lgta h ki tu kabhi sports nhi khela inter iit m ðŸ˜¢ðŸ˜. But football instincts h tujhme, i will give you that. Games sahi khel leta h waise tu like chess. Naa jaane kitni trophies statpad krdi khali chess khelke ðŸ”¥.
Hrishikesh m pehli baar upstream ka live example dikhaya tune with 0 velocity lol. Abhi bhi Scooty dekhke khush hota h kya bacche jaise? Tez chalane doesn't prove horse shit bro ðŸ˜‚. Duniya ke saare adventure krne h tujhe to, chalo sahi h kabhi kuch karne ka mann kra to I know I can count on you. Goa m to maza aagya yr. Ashish ki ranting se lekar kabhi nhi peene ka wada ðŸ˜‚. Saale dance to sikhaya tha mene tujhe tera dhyaan nhi tha to mein kya karu. Jo frisbee maari h tune mugal aur Shubham ko shayad maza hi aagya ðŸ˜‚. Last day kayaking karna was the best thing yr â¤ï¸. Tujhe waise kaunsa character diya tha aot m? Connie shayad ðŸ˜‚. Lagta h tujhe sabse jyada pyaar samundar se hi h iss janam m to. 
Ek to apne pun sudhar saale. Kab tak logo ko hasata rhega aise. College m sports karne se ladki to nhi mili but chalo tu hi sahi ðŸ˜œ. I Hope that ki tu mere level pe pahunch jaye kabhi ðŸ˜‰. Apn dono Ka ye sahi h ki kabhi kaam ki baat nhi karte aapas m. We dont need to be serious with each other atleast. Kabhi unique nhi hone diya yr tune mujhe ðŸ˜‚. Ek baar itna acha chance tha hone ka jab college se nikalane ki dhamki di thi but usme bhi tu saath aagya ðŸ˜‚. Our trips during that time >>>. Hope ki tu aise hi kide karta rha aur saath rahe bas. 
Love you bro â¤ï¸
Take care 
Milte h agli trip pe yaa pehle bhi idk lol
P.s. sam aur mukesh to thukra diye tujhe ab kaun rkhega be ðŸ˜‚
P.p.s. jhaantu >>> abhijaat (high time you change it permanently) kartik kaun h waise ðŸ¤”
author: Kratik  Jain

text:
"Do dost, Ek chaabi", "Do bottle, Ek hi m paani", "Do balti, Ek magga", "Do saal, Ek roomie" aur "Do raah, Ek saphar"....
Tujhe roomie banane ka life decision m abhi tk nhi top kr paya hu. Shukla ko kabhi dikkat hi nhi hoti h. Chahe light jali ho, speaker baj rhe ho, movie chal rhi ho, bhai khali paani dhundta tha aur wo bhi naa mile to so jaata tha. 
Chai ka ever ready partner aur mera veg saathi. Bhagwaan m utna hi believe krta h jitna iron man m (i literally saw him cry after his death in a movie... RIP). Aur ab to weebs bhi bann chuke h hum dono (Thanks for my first anime bro.... Kimi no Na wa <3)
Bhut miss krunga yr tere harr 5 min wale alarms ko aur tere saath kre gye harr tareeke k discussions ko. Exam se pehle bhagwaan k bhajan kaun sunega ab saath aur kaun dega mujhe machchar daani.
Thanks for being always by my side bro, Harr HC ki trip k liye, room ka nahane ka equilibrium banaye rkhne k liye, harr mech k saphar k liye.
All the best bro for the future now. Itna determined hona asaan nhi hota jitna tu h. Hope we meet again soon and you have a better motivating speech ready this time lol.
Baah for life. Goodbye. Take Care.
author: Kratik  Jain

text:
Aur Bakait
Apne rr ke liye college m mashhoor. But the Bakait i know is pyaara, always looking for chotte chotte jokes and itni cute hasi. Like yr tu kitna mischievous h, pehle royega, phir saamne wale ki tareef krega, phir halki si cunning smile dega aur phir asli bakait bahar aayega. The asli bakait is super cool, caring, adventurous, a phaad dancer, a heavy driver (tera scooty bhai XD) and a not so sober guy.
Bro sab naachne ke liye bhale hi mujhe bolte ho lekin fan favourite to tu hi h. Antaragni, techkriti, etc etc. khub naache h yr apn. Photo khichwane ka itna bada shaukeen h tu ye nhi pata tha yr but i'm glad that i got to know you because phir drunken bakait kaise dekhne ko milta. The drunken you is so cute lol. The voice, moves and teri baatein are alag level after that.
Covid m bhi tu ek support tha jisse roz baat karke dukh baat ta tha m. Keep in touch bhai. tu bomb h apna.
Looking forward to meeting you whenever possible. Bas IAS banke bhul na jaana.
Chalo be Take care till then :) Milte h 
Good Luck kahne ki jarurat bhi nhi h tujhe to.. See ya <3
author: Kratik  Jain

text:
Arraaaaaay isko nhi dena tha ðŸ˜‚

Bhai tere m itna energy kaise aata h. Chal Fifa khelte h, chal canteen chalte h, chal order karte h ðŸ˜‚ yahi sab bolte hue paya jaata h tu. 1st year m bhut halla machaya h tumne wing m. Green bomb saale tu hi laya mini militia m sabse pehle. Teri wajah se pareshaan hogye log. Suicidal tendency game se hi thi tujhe to ðŸ˜‚ Phir bhi kuch bhi bolo dil ka bhut acha insaan h yr tu. Kisi ko bura na lag jaye iska pura dhyaan rkhta h tu yaa help karne k liye hamesha ready rahna. Tere muh se to gaali bhi meethi lagti h yr itna pyaara h tu. Aur waise mera naam mini militia m Ludos tha Lodus nhi to wo kyun bulata h ðŸ˜‚. 

Ek aur trip maarte h yr khali uttarakhand se kya hoga. jaisi sexy photos tune daal rakhi h idhar waise aur bhi to chahiye naa. Miss your pizza experiments bro. bhut bure pizza se ache pizza tk sab khaya h tere kahne pe ðŸ˜‚. Fifa m tune mujhe thodi bhut baar hara to diya but saale aur tactics to laga cross krne k alawa. Sports chalu krde yr khelna kab tk chess khelega ðŸ˜‚. Chal jyada troll nhi karunga nhi to agli baar veg bolke anda mangwa lega tu XD. Tujhme alag hi spring h bhai, jaha dekho waha koodane lgega, chadne lgega matlab bhai aaram se ðŸ˜‚. Lekin tere chm102 aur DS ka rr bhut yaad aayega. Everything is cool and fun until Goel gets serious. Khaskar intern k time pe (i understand tho ;)) Tere cooler ne bhut tshirt phaadi h saale (meri bhi) Lekin maza bhi aata tha tere cooler m garmi m. World cup aur kitni baar aake so jaata tha m tumhare room pe.

Bas aise hi energy inject karta rha, Pizza khilata rha (acha wala please) aur practice kr bhut fifa m nhi to kabhi nhi hara payega mukesh aur mujhe ðŸ˜‚. Paiso ki chinta bhi chodd de ab bahut kamane wala h, jitna bachaya h saara kharch kar daal humpe aur aane wali kisi pe :p Aur dosto ko bhi message kar liya kar yaar kabhi :p

Chal aur batana milne pe. Take care. Mera bhai â¤ï¸
author: Kratik  Jain

Chal bro take care!!!
Apni knee ka dhyaan rakhna bro 
All the best !!!

text:
Pandey bolna thoda ajeeb lgta h yr tujhe sb wahi bolte h. You deserve a nickname bhai ab to... rakh denge wo bhi ðŸ˜‚

1st year m kya jungle tha bhai tumhara room. Best kutte ka impression aaj tk tujhse hi dekha h. Sam ko itna molest kre ho ki ab Sam kya seedhe phansi milegi. lekin inn first year walon ko tumne hi khola h ðŸ˜‚ Itna energy/tharak kaise tha tum m pehle saal se hi ðŸ˜‚ Bilkul clear goal tha tumhara shuru se hi branch change maaro coding kro aur paisa kamao, bilkul sophisticated banane ka try nhi kra tumne (which i really appreciate man) bhut enthu tha tum m padne ka aur notes banane ka 2-3 saal tk. acha h dheere dheere seekh gye reality lol. kitni bhi tareef krdu lekin ek cheez ki kbhi nhi kr paunga aur wo h tumhari writing ðŸ˜‚ notes banane ka fayda kya agar hamare kaam nhi aaye to saale

Itne course kre h saath m (ds included jisko krne k liye tumne G ka zor lga diya lol) aur sb m aakhri min tk assignment krna aur phir sam ki haalat dekhke khush hona ðŸ˜‚. phatta acha chalu kra tha yr apn ne maza aata h tha badiya. tumhara lamba ki fast ball pe chidna ðŸ˜‚. Spo m rhke kitne logo ki baatein suni hongi kaise kr lete ho ye sb. sbka rr, sbki gaaliyan, sbke dukh ðŸ˜‚. mene placement k time jb rant kra tha tumhare messenger pe and then deleted them and you called me after that man, That was special bro â¤ï¸. Harr baar good news tumne hi di h mujhe to intern ki bhi placement ki bhi. 
intern k interview k time bada dilasa bhi diya tumne aur anime fans se hello seekhna (lol what were we thinking). but pata tha sbko pandey h to chill h (itni respect pandey kaise handle kriðŸ˜‚). tumhari intern lgne par bhi sbse pehle gale apn hi lage the hostel m ðŸ˜

pyaare aadmi ho tum yr. koi fake coolness nhi, koi boasting nhi. tumhari aankhe bhai kitni bhaari h seriously. kuch bhi thoda sad bolte ho jb to dard dikhta h yr unme ðŸ¥º. tumhare paseene wale hugs aur man (.)(.) to bhut hi unique h mere liye ðŸ˜‚ aise hi pyaar phalate rho jisse milo. bhut stories sunnani h abhi tumhe humko to yaad rkhna unko. Man in Black to apn h hi ðŸ˜Ž To aise hi haste rho, stories sunate rho, mahol banate rho, kaam aate rho ðŸ˜‚( P.S. mujhe pata h ki tumne mera summer m eco nhi bhara tha ðŸ˜). Tumhare saath trip bachi hui h to wo to krke hi rhenge aur wo bhi tumhare dream pay ke 1.5 times bache hue paiso se ðŸ˜‚
P.S: Love you â¤ï¸
P.P.S: Sam se hi puchle ðŸ˜

author: Kratik  Jain

text:
Aur Jassi 
Kya yr Itna to sunil sir ko nhi jaante honge football wale jitna jassi paaji ko jaante h. Shuru se hi mulakat hogyi tujhse to. Freshers inferno m jab tu 2nd aaya tha rivalry establish hogyi thi lol. But then Cpa m mile and jyada kuch jaan pehchaan nhi hui apni because tum bade log to senior team k saath khelne lage 1st year se hi ðŸ™Œ. But then aaya summer camp and finally i got to meet you (lucky meðŸ˜Œ). Regularity m i think ki tu hi h jo mujhe competition diya hoga lol. But i miss yr apne subah wale workouts and then shade m glucose peete hue ghanto tak baatein krna and you all feeding on my non-veg portion ðŸ˜‚. Bhai tera abs ka raaz ab to disclose karde. Punching bag bana diya tha unhe to. Phir shaam ko juice pilata tha jassi ðŸ˜. Sand training yaad h? bhai sahi maza aata tha usme. Baaki treats aur inn sab m hi nikal gya summer camp.

Phir 2nd year m to regular football chalu kr hi diya. Tu apna mast Right back, left back, center back sab khel leta tha. Pehli baat to tere goals bhai. Kya hi bolu bc. Patake maarta tha half line se yaa bhut dur se aur seedha goal m. Bhai Bhai abhi bhi sochke maza aagya ðŸ˜. Phir kaafi match khele 2nd year m to kanpur league, udghosh, inter iit, kanpur championship, etc etc ðŸ˜‚. Pura winter camp ka non veg tujhme aur shubhankar m hi baat diya mene to. Inter iit yr kya feel tha guwahati m. Itna sundar college khada kar rakha h. Upar se feel aa jaati thi warmup karte hue. Plus teri shubhankar ki itni ladai ðŸ˜‚. Aakhri din pineapple bhi khareede the. Photo h mere pass ðŸ˜‚ teri aur tomar ki.

Khub treats pe gaye h saath m. Sacchi m jitni baar wing walon k saath nhi gya college se bahar usse jyada tumhare saath gya hu. Kya badi badi treats karte the. Mujhe non veg khilane ki bhut koshish kri yr jassi tune, but sorry yr mein nhi khaya ðŸ˜‚. Agli baar milenge to saath veg khayenge ðŸ˜‚.

Aur bhai kaisa lga 2nd year m hi gensec banke. Sabki fuddi faad di thi bhai ðŸ˜‚. Bhai apna youngest gensec h bhai. Phir to bhai ka college m naam hi hogya. Status bhi mil gya, Bandi bhi mil gyi ðŸ˜œ. Lekin jassi doston ko nhi bhula. Tera kamra haye ram kya saaf rahta h. Machar maarne ki ninja technique bhi seekhi h tujhse lol. 

Mast aadmi h yr tu aisa hi rahna. Cute si smile, Ping pong wala juda (i still have that photo btw), humble, itna hard working aur passionate harr kaam ko leke. Tujhse acha gensec nhi bann skta tha yr koi. Aur tera story narration bhi yr yaad aayega ðŸ˜‚. Jab koi kaam nhi aata Jassi kaam aata h. Suit ke liye shukriya photo shoot k liye ðŸ™Œ.

Bas aise hi smile karta rha, mehnat karta rha aur baat karta rha. Sexy placement lagne ki party bhi lenge tujhse alag se bhul mat jaana. Chalo veere.
Take Care. Good luck â¤ï¸

P.S. football dekhna chalu krde yr ab to hadd hogyi h saala 4 saal football khel liya lekin 4 minute football nhi dekha
author: Kratik  Jain

text:
The most respectable person for me in the college. How you influence others around you is so graceful. Naa jaane kitne course me assist kra h mujhe tune. 1st year to pura saath hi nikla h, roll no. bhi aaspass aur wing m bhi harr samay saath. Hope my P.E. instructions paid off XD. One of my few Veg saathi bhi h tu (par anda bhi khata h lol). Shubham Tharwani ki bitching nahi rukni chahiye in general bhi.
Remember shayad 1st year me ek baar apn roof pe gye the btop ki and there we discussed our stories and crushes and what not lol. Hope we meet up soon and make up for the missing stories. Till then Chaapta rha aur bhul na jaana yr. 
P.S. Watch seedhi pehanane laga kya finally XD
author: Kratik  Jain

text:
Hey Baby (Read it in your voice ðŸ˜‚)
Literally the most caring person in the campus. Naa Jaane humne aisa kya kra ki tum itni care karne lage hamari. Tere bina sahi m Degree puri nhi ho paati meri to. Hamesha last moment pe cycle maangne aata tha tumse lab k liye aur agar tumhari kisi aur k pass hoti thi to jugaad bhi karwa dete the tum. Ek baar to mene tumhari chaabi bhi kho diti aur tumhari cycle gate k cycle stand pe raha gyi thi aur tab bhi tumhi mujhe cycle pe baithake gate tk le gye the <3. Your constant hugs are what i will miss the most. Kabhi lonely feel hi nhi hone diya tumne. Hamesha canteen chalne k liye ready aur fifa khelne ke liye bhi. I dont remember but shayad fifa ka addiction mere wajah se hi laga h tumhe ðŸ˜‚. Last 1-2 saal to mene tumhe goel yaa najan k room pe fifa khelte hue hi dekha h bas. Yaa agar pizza kha rhe hote the to share hamesha karte the tum.
Hamesha respectful conversation aur discussion karne k liye (despite people using the state card XD) bhut respect badd gyi h tumhari hamare liye. Ek hi trip kra saath m Uttrakhand wala but wo bhi itna legendary aur memorable. Thank you for trusting my driving skills the most ;) Pure trip m mere saath hi rahe tum. Bas thoda darna kam karo yr :p Ab to life m bhut cliffs se kudna hoga. Tumhare dost hamesha saath h tumhare <3 Ab to old rajendra nagar bhi nikal loge tum. Agar mein delhi aaya to Sam k liye bhi jang hogi ðŸ˜‚ Jo bhi ho apan to touch m rahne hi h bs tum aise hi khush, caring aur strong bane raho. 
Love you bro <3
P.S. Fifa m kab harayoge hume yr ðŸ˜‚ kitni practice aur. Lekin apna goal karne ke baad celebration mat bhulna. wahi favorite part h mera ðŸ˜‚.
author: Kratik  Jain

text:
Yo Rajababu !!
A perfect chick magnet :p Chaapu, Photographer, Sports, Raees ;), gym aur kitna bole thakk jayenge. Baaki andar se bhut motivating aur ache insaan ho yaar tum. Hagge ke iss side ko hagge ke uss side se connect krne wale link the tum XD. lucky charm ho tum mere liye ;) tumhare blazer se hi interview diya intern ka aur agar ab bangalore aana hua to sabse pass tum hi ho :)) Game Theory m bhi kya kaata yr mam ne apna lmao XD. Tumhari stories bhi kaafi badiya h ladkiyon k maamle m ;pp 
Uttrakhand ki trip bhai bhut sexy thi. khaas kr wo chadai pe scooty bhai (sorry uss time mukesh ko tumse churane ke liye :p) Tum me gazab ka leadership aura h yaar. Sabko saath rakhna aur motivate karte rahna is what i admire the most about you. Bhut curious bhi ho tum, Sab try karte ho (mini militia pro bhi bann gye the ek time pe to) Aur ab to IAS bhi bann jayoge to yaad rakhna XD
Bas aise hi saath banaye rakho aur bhi kayi jagah saath photo khichani h ;) All the best Tab Tak apne naye adventure k liye 
P.S. ek trip aur plan karte h yaar 
P.P.S. Camera ki photo bhi daaldo yaar drive pe :p
author: Kratik  Jain

Take care _/\_

author: Kratik  Jain

text:
Kem Palty
Pata nhi kha chupa hua tha 1st year m. Dard dilo ke kam ho jaate agar tum thoda jaldi mil jaate. Tharwani ko atleast humko milane ka credit to dena hi padega. Ek to tu hagge ke uss side aur tha isliye bhi time lag gya pass aane m. Thodi bhut hi jaan pehchaan thi apni tab wo bhi oneplus aur vibrant ki wajah se. Chalo jo bhi ho we finally met ache se in 2nd year and najan the goat mila mujhe.

Initially thoda hi football m enthu share karte the apn but then you started playing fpl and dreams 11 and all, then  you came to papa for advice lol. Tab maza aane lga tujhse baat karke and almost roz football talk shuru hogya apna. Mess m ho chahe Canteen m, Itna nostalgia hota tha baat krke. Uss beech tujhe fifa m bhi interest aagya hume dekh dekhke. Kaafi haath pair chalaye tune seekhne ke liye and you became a true fifa addict â¤ï¸ (just like how its supposed to be). Phir to kya roz fpl discuss kro, fifa khelo, match dekho, bitching kro and repeat. Tujhe thoda bhut shauk bhi tha football khelne ka ground pe tu hamesha puchta tha mujhse aau kya khelne, mein hamesha haan bolta tha lekin i knew ki obviously tere jitna procrastinate krne wala aadmi nhi aayega ðŸ˜‚. 

Dheere dheere phir zomato ki lat bhi lg gyi apn ko (credit to goel and you). Itne tatti pizza khae sirf mess se bachane k liye (understandable tho lol). Canteen m bhi veg hi khata tha tu atleast to paneer to roz ka hi tha apna. But kab naa jaane football se shuru hue apn log jyada hi close aa gye. Football ki bitching se chalu krte hue life ki bitching krne lg gye. And who is the best bitching partner (ofc you).

Tu apni chillness aur optimism k karan bhut badnaam tha but later bhai dekha how important these things are. Under 200 AIR bhale hi tere cpi m naa dikhe lol but tere personality m h bro. You see the big picture and its really hard to be calm about it. Hidden genius in normie words.

Apni trips to yr kya batau kya sexy hui h abhi take and jo plans h apne aur sexy hone ka chance h. Rishikesh was epic. Scooty, Rafting, Train, delhi and all was amazing. Sorry yr tujhe 3-0 Liverpool k liye nhi uthane ko (in the end it doesnt even matters). Goa bhai really tough away fixture tha apne liye. Apne bina to trip hi nhi ho paata ye wala to. Jis tarah se logo ko ek ek karke convince karne m lag gya, Gaand hi lag gyi thi. But finally goa ka trip was sexy and successful. Ojas ko badiya le aaya tu uske bina kaun pilata apne ko lol. Pool side drinking yaad rhegi and swimming pool m jyada fun krna compared to beaches lol. Rooney celebration karte h wapas kabhi. Ab world cup aur krna h and life worth it feel hogi.

Campus m aake bhi yr mein football hi nhi khel pya tumhare saath (fuck my toe). Lekin we had our fun in other ways. Ab to tu itna close aagya h ki kya hi bolna tere baare m aur kuch. Ek hi game khelte h, ek hi team ko support krte h, hopefully ek hi city m bhi honge. 

Itna kamata h ab kharcha chalu krde bhai. Dosto pe, trips pe, party pe, jerseys pe. Milte to roz hi h apn whatsapp pe bas yahi chalta rha.

Bete abhi to saath hi apn. Bs chill rha, agenda banaye rakh kuch players ke liye and let me counter them. Milte h jald hi. Take care. See yaa. 
Love you broâ¤ï¸
Visca El BarÃ§a ðŸ”´ðŸ”µ

P.s hxh complete krdena yr tab tak and aot bhi
author: Kratik  Jain

text:
Hi Fellow cule ðŸ”µðŸ”´
Koeman to nhi bacha paya barca ko hope karte h ki laporta bachayega ðŸ˜‰
Aisa lagat h lockdown apne group ke bina kate hi nahi. Naa jaane literally kitna football discuss kra h apn ne group pe ðŸ˜‚ But what we share is the pain we are going through.
Antaragni me abhi bhi tumhari shayariyan yaad h ðŸ™Œ Canteen m occasional matches dekhna. Tumhare dabbe pe fifa khelna ðŸ˜‚ Lekin jaan pehchaan to apni fpl draft se hi hui thi. Bhut maza aata tha yr usme bhi ðŸ˜
Ab to dil ka connection ho chuka h to touch m to rahna hi h. Bas aise hi haste raho, likhate raho aur saath gum baat te raho. Take care bhai. Forca barca
author: Kratik  Jain

text:
Arre Shashi sir kya hi bolu aapke baare m. Bhut positive, bhut hasmukh, aur bhut calm insaan ho yr tum. Kayi baar tumhari wajah se hi din ki pehli smile hoti thi. Soke utho late, thoda mood off hota tha and then canteen m yaa wing m shashi dikh jaaye to bs smile aa jaati thi. Jab sab log pehle 1-2 saal apni magai aur project m the hum log khel rhe the XD. Roz aaspass ground pe training kr rhe h and then mess m ekdum late milke khana. Senator to tum banane hi the usko to koi nhi rok sakta tha lekin sacchi m itni khushi hui thi jb pata chala ki tum jeet gye (kyun naa hoti kuch log jinka naam nhi lunga tumhe underdog jo maan baithe the). Uttrakhand m bhi jamke maze kre the. Jab aadhe log apn mandir gye the, Kya scooty bhagayi thi yr :)) Aur tumhara wo turn pe slip to mention krna hi padega XD. Kaise bottle se petrol bhar bharke wapas hotel laute the XXD. 
Bas aise hi gyaan dete raho :p aur positivity maintain krte rho bhut jarurat h yr tumhare jaise logo ki <3. Delhi aaye to phir to kya hi kahna. nhi bhi aaye to bhi touch m rahna h. Keep laughing bro and iss saal ki trip ka compensation kro jaldi yr.
P.S. Jab shashi bolta h to sab sunte h
author: Kratik  Jain

text:
Yo madridista
The ultimate chaapu, dancer, dj and resaarcher XD. Shuru se hi apan saath rhe h. Pehle OnePlus gang, phir clasico rivals, antaragni partners (teri wajah se hi mein dance ke event dekha nhi to saara fun miss ho jaat bro), EDM guiders ðŸ˜‚ (humko hi kyun chalu krna hota tha yr) and shubham roasters. Tune kaafi gyaan diya h (in a positive way ofc) mujhe chahe music ho, dance ho, koi badiya app yaa food recommendation (which was rare for us veg people :'))
I respect you a lot for the things you have managed to achieve while still having fun, gossip and vibing. Hamesha genuine advice dene ke liye shukriya and i hope you manage to achieve what you aim for. So keep dancing, make others laugh and remain the genius you are.
Keep in touch bro. Take care. All the best. Puta madrid
author: Kratik  Jain

oye suppu
nahaya kr yr (ironic i know ðŸ˜‚)
author: Kratik  Jain

text:
Yo Suppu!!
Mere bhai and same baap ki badnaseeb aulaad
Mere jitne sone aur nahane ka passion bas tu hi share krta h puri wing me ðŸ˜…. Lekin atleast meri jacket white se Yellow to nhi hoti (you beat me there lol). Hum bhaiyo me tu hi h eklota artist. ChaapuðŸ˜ Violin aur drams dono kr leta h. Siraj ne tujhse bada violin bajwaya uske alawa to tune kabhi sunaya hi nhi hume to kuch. Waise hi bengali hone se reputation kharab thi upar se saale drams aur join kr liya ðŸ˜‚. Isse kahta h true courage to. 
Inn sab ke alawa programming god to tu h hi. Pura first year Shubham aur tune ki apna dabdaba banaye rakha ðŸ˜‚. Tujhse kitne bhi logical yaa kaise bhi discussion krwalo maza aata h yr. Rational aur itne sexy arguments deta h apna suppu. Defence mechanism word se hubahu tune hi kraya (abhi bhi tharwani ka weak point h ye ðŸ˜‚). Tere jitna chicken pelte hue kisi ko nhi dekha kasam se ðŸ˜‚. True non veg h tu (itna non veg ki baaki non veg bhi uncomfortable ho jaye). Baaki wing me chakkar lgate hue yaa phone pe baat krte hue paaya jaata tha tu mostly wing me. Ek sexy trip krle hamare saath bhi bhai, Maana ki hum drams ke yaa bengali nhi but dost to h bhai ðŸ˜‚. Teri drams performnace dekhne aaye h yr hamesha itna to payback banta h. 
Chal milte h kabhi phir. Jab tk annoy krta rha apne aaju baaju walo ko with a pinch of gyaan ofc, kuch bhi bolke smile krta rha jaise kya joke maara ho ðŸ˜‚, aur nobel milne pe bhul naa jaana bs yaa tab tk pagla naa jaana (physics wala bhadwe hote hi aise h).
Take care bro. Good luck. Milte h â¤ï¸
author: Kratik  Jain

text:
Vipin bro!!!!
Sweetest guy pure college ka. Ekdum seedha sadha aur shareef. Jab bhi milta h hamesha haal chaal aur mausam yaa class k baare m jarur puchta h. Bhut caring banda h tu yr. Isliye bandi bhi sirf tumhari hi h ðŸ¤­. First year m mulakat nhi ho paayi ache se but baaki time bhut acha laga tujhse milke. Trip m bhi khub pela. Teri cycle bhi kaafi baar maangi h football jaane k liye (thanks for that). Baaton m bhi kaafi dum rahta h teri (morals and ideals) isliye everyone adores you.
Chaapu to tu h hi bs badiya lga rha and see yaa bro in future. 
Bye. Take care <3
